Package cpsc2150.extendedConnectX.models

Interface IGameBoard

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbsGameBoard, GameBoard, GameBoardMem
    public interface IGameBoard
    Initialization ensures that an instance of GameBoard will be created with the dimensions chosen

    • Method Detail

      • checkIfFree

        default boolean checkIfFree​(int c)
        returns true if column c can accept another token
        Parameters:
        c - column number
        Returns:
        true or false depending on column capacity
        Pre:
        c >= MIN_SIZE AND c < MAX_SIZE
        Post:
        true if column can accept another token, otherwise false

      • checkForWin

        default boolean checkForWin​(int c)
        returns true if last token placed in column c results in a win
        Parameters:
        c - column number
        Returns:
        true or false depending on if last token results in a win
        Pre:
        c >= MIN_SIZE AND c < MAX_SIZE
        Post:
        true if game is won

      • placeToken

        void placeToken​(char p,
                int c)
        places token in lowest available row in column c
        Parameters:
        p - player token character
        c - column number
        Pre:
        c >= 0 AND p is a char value
        Post:
        token is placed in lowest available row

      • checkHorizWin

        default boolean checkHorizWin​(BoardPosition pos,
                              char p)
        checks for a horizontal win
        Parameters:
        BoardPosition - holds [row][column] position on the board
        p - player token character
        Returns:
        true if player has 5 tokens in a row horizontally, otherwise false
        Pre:
        p is a char AND BoardPosition is a valid position
        Post:
        true id a player wins, otherwise false

      • checkVertWin

        default boolean checkVertWin​(BoardPosition pos,
                             char p)
        checks for vertical win
        Parameters:
        BoardPosition - holds [row][column] position on the board
        p - player token character
        Returns:
        true if player has 5 tokens in a row vertically, otherwise false
        Pre:
        p is a char AND BoardPosition is a valid position
        Post:
        true if a player wins, otherwise false

      • checkDiagWin

        default boolean checkDiagWin​(BoardPosition pos,
                             char p)
        checks for a diagonal win
        Parameters:
        BoardPosition - holds [row][column] position on the board
        p - player token character
        Returns:
        true if player has 4 tokens in a row diagonally, otherwise false
        Pre:
        p is a char AND BoardPosition is a valid position
        Post:
        true if a player wins, otherwise false

      • whatsAtPos

        char whatsAtPos​(BoardPosition pos)
        returns what is at the given position on the board
        Parameters:
        BoardPosition - holds [row][column] position on the board
        Returns:
        char in given position
        Pre:
        BoardPosition is a valid position
        Post:
        char in the position is known

      • isPlayerAtPos

        default boolean isPlayerAtPos​(BoardPosition pos,
                              char player)
        returns true if player token is on a specific position
        Parameters:
        BoardPosition - holds [row][column] position on the board
        player - char of player token
        Returns:
        true if player char is at position, otherwise false
        Pre:
        BoardPosition is a valid position AND player is a char
        Post:
        true if given char and given position match

      • checkTie

        default boolean checkTie()
        returns true if the game board results in a tie game
        Returns:
        true or false depending on if there is no winner
        Pre:
        checkIfFree(int c) on columns chosen_row_num-chosen_col_num must return false
        Post:
        tied game if true

      • getNumRows

        int getNumRows()
        returns the number of rows
        Returns:
        getNumRows() = NUM_ROWS;

      • getNumColumns

        int getNumColumns()
        returns the number of columns
        Returns:
        getNumColumns() = NUM_COLS;

      • getNumToWin

        int getNumToWin()
        returns the number in a row needed to win
        Returns:
        getNumToWin() = NUM_TO_WIN;
